title: Bug 117981 - Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Observed behavior: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.

Expected behavior: The selected item in the library outline view should remain focused and highlighted after the initial selection.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
